concept.title: Content browser panel
concept.shortdesc: The Content Browser panel offers you a quick and convenient way to open drawings, manage your block libraries, copy dimension styles, place views for your entire .dwg files stored on your computer.

section.title: Add folder…
section.p: Displays the Choose a folder dialog box.

section.title: Refresh
section.p: Select a drawing and press the Refresh button to expand its content (Blocks, Dimension Styles, Model Views).

section.title: Definitions in the selected drawing
section.p: Select Blocks/Dimension styles/Model views to see the definitions used within the drawing.
You can drag & drop a block onto the current drawing and an Insert Block dialog box will appear.
If you drag & drop a dimension style to your drawing a Copy / Paste dialog box will appear.

section.title: Local Folders tree
section.p: Displays the content of a drawing/project. Right-click menus enable you to add or remove folders from within the Folders tree.

section.title: Definitions’ preview
section.p: Shows a preview of your drawing/block/dimension style.

section.title: Description
section.p: Displays a description of your selected definition.
